metadata.title: CVE-2019-19343 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: A flaw was found in Undertow when using Remoting as shipped in Red HatJboss EAP before version 7.2.4. A memory leak in HttpOpenListener due toholding remote connections indefinitely may lead to denial of service.Versions before undertow 2.0.25.SP1 and jboss-remoting 5.0.14.SP1 arebelieved to be vulnerable.

criterions.comment: undertow: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
